column4: I have a problem, I have only 180 MB of free space, can I get ubuntu?
options...bigger disk to replace current one
option b) install to an external disk
c) free up space on current disk, back up the data, resize the partition, install ubuntu as secondary OS
Can I make VLC the default video-playing program?
System > Preferences > Preferred Application > Select Multimedia Tab > Select custom in the drop down menu > type wxvlc in the text box and close
